title: " Personalized " skin for beloved champion
body:
Hey guys,

What do you think about having a personalized skin for your main champion?

Imagine a new tier of skins, one that would be named "Master" Skin.

Here is how I imagined it:

If you own all the skins for a champion, you would be able to unlock this Master skin that shows your devotion and all the time spent playing that champion.

The Master skin would be completely different from the other ones, because it would have a few amazing features:

- you could customize it with your desired colors
- you would be able to customize it every time before the game starts

If you like my idea, we could think together about some other features. I would like to receive your feedback on this one. ^.^

Thanks for taking your time to read this and good luck in your games! ^.^
